title: Onboarding During A Pandemic: Can It Really Work? New Joiner, Lily Nguyen, Shares Her Experience.
description: I recently joined the Sales Development APAC team, looking after the Vietnam, Thailand and Hong Kong markets. I'd already had a great impression of Akamai's culture from my interview rounds. But how would the onboarding work? I'd been looking forward to meeting new colleagues in an office environment. I wanted to feel part of a new team; that sense of collaboration you get from personal interaction. Instead, I only got to meet our IT guy outside the office who presented me with my MacBook Pro.
author: Akamai
